About Vat19:
Vat19 is dedicated to "curiously awesome" gifts, candy, toys, gummy, putty, puzzles, games, and more! In addition to making funny commercials you'll actually want to watch, we produce amazing challenge videos, document our outrageous contraptions, and invite you to a front row seat for our silly stunts. Sometimes we blow things up, fill up a bathtub or pool with crazy stuff, dare each other to eat super spicy foods, and answer “burning questions” from our viewers.

关于Vat19。
Vat19致力于提供 "奇特的真棒 "的礼物，糖果，玩具，橡皮糖，腻子，拼图，游戏，以及更多! 除了制作你真正想看的有趣的广告，我们还制作了令人惊奇的挑战视频，记录了我们令人发指的装置，并邀请你到前排座位观看我们的愚蠢特技。有时我们会把东西炸开，用疯狂的东西填满浴缸或游泳池，挑战对方吃超辣的食物，并回答观众的 "燃烧的问题"。

next.excerpt:
Please *boop* the like button if you enjoy the video! :)

X Life is a 1.14.4 modded survival multiplayer server (SMP) with youtuber friends. Every player starts with 10 lives but only 1 heart. Every time you lose a life, you gain a heart on your health bar. 
Today I'm enacting my revenge on Jacksucks.

localize.title: Revenge 👿 | Ep.21 | Minecraft X Life SMP
localize.description:
如果你喜欢这段视频，请*boop*喜欢的按钮! :)

X生活是一个1.14.4的moded生存多人服务器（SMP）与youtuber朋友。每个玩家开始时有10条生命，但只有一颗心。每当你失去一条生命，你就会在你的健康栏上获得一颗心。
今天，我将对杰克斯进行复仇。

localize.title: Revenge 👿 | Ep.21 | Minecraft X Life SMP
localize.description:
如果你喜歡這段視頻，請*boop*喜歡的按鈕! :)

X生活是一個1.14.4的moded生存多人服務器（SMP）與youtuber朋友。每個玩家開始時有10條生命，但只有一顆心。每當你失去一條生命，你就會在你的健康欄上獲得一顆心。
今天，我將對傑克斯進行復仇。
